history.proof: intros x. hauto use: Ring.ax4, @plus_reg_r, @plus_opp_l, @plus_zero_l, @opp_zero unfold: mult, Ring.base, Ring.sort, Ring.AbelianGroup, AbelianGroup.sort.

original: intros x. rewrite <- mult_zero_r. rewrite <- Ring.ax4. rewrite plus_opp_r. rewrite AnabelianGroup.ax4. rewrite plus_zero_l. reflexivity.
